page.title: 06RECREATION 2
page.content: From the point of view of recreation village halls are very important. Many people use the mobile library & T.V., audio,vidio & records are also popular.Theatres,cinemas & restaurants are frequented as are pubs where social drinking & eating & games such as darts,snooker,pool & the old Kentish game of Bat & Trap occur. WRVS,WI & social clubs exist, eg. "Merry & Bright" for the elderly.There are anglers,football & cricket clubs.Cubs & Brownies meet in Hothfield;Scouts & Venture Scouts meet in Ashford.Bingo, Whist & Bridge are also popular.For all of these groups coach trips,barbecues,dances,discos, dinner parties, car treasure hunts, 50/50 auctions & boot sales are organised. For these,village halls & village greens play an important part.
